name: O.R.B. (Millot, Axel Basselier-Marchal, Srybe, DrGloutsch, Elmea, SupaDruide)
name_original: O.R.B. (Millot, Axel Basselier-Marchal, Srybe, DrGloutsch, Elmea, SupaDruide)
description:
SAVE BRAZIL AND THE WORLD!

Robots are taking over Brazil and you have to fight the invaders as Orange Man himself in this juicy 2.5D Action Game !

Includes a gacha system: Collect figurines from other games made by students by opening orange juice cans that you collect when beating a level (5 levels in total)!
